articles.title: WHO Recommends Malaria Vaccine Made By Oxford University, Serum Institute - NDTV
articles.description: The R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine developed by the University of Oxford and the Serum Institute of India has been recommended for use by the World Health Organisation (WHO) after meeting required safety, quality and effectiveness standards.
articles.content:
To date, the R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine has been licensed for use in Ghana, Nigeria and Burkina Faso.
